alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Cody Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 8:05AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Winds Expected Through the Day... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Strong west to northwest winds gusting 50 to 60 mph in the mountains, and 40 to 50 mph in the lower elevations around Dubois and Cody. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains, northeast portion of the Wind River Mountains, Cody Foothills, and Dubois area. * WHEN...This morning through 7 PM Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for sudden wind gusts on area roads. Lightweight and high profile vehicles will be at risk to blow over. This includes Highway 120 from Meeteetse to the Montana border, Chief Joseph Pass, Highway 20 from Cody to Yellowstone, and Highway 26 from Crowheart to Togwotee Pass.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Cody Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
